On timing: we do expect to move relatively quickly once families submit an application—if you feel Nursery_E could be a good match, applying sooner helps us seriously consider you in the next few rounds.

In admissions, we prioritize families who are aligned with a play-based approach, consistent attendance/communication, and a collaborative relationship with teachers (supporting routines, kindness, and age-appropriate independence).
